title: Watch: Ron DeSantis surprises fans at a Lynyrd Skynyrd concert to the sound of thunderous applause
description:
If by lying if I said I knew there were any original members of Lynyrd Skynyrd left touring with the band. It's still cool to see the Jacksonville legends joined on stage by another Jacksonville legend, America's governor Ron DeSantis. This is where everyone screams "Free Bird."

Or at the very least, "DUUUUUVAL!"

title: Doocy backs WH into a corner: If Biden's top domestic priority is inflation, why does he suck so hard at it?

title: Democrat Panic: NYT shows MASSIVE swing of independent women voters to the GOP
description: Even the nerdiest of political nerds will drive themselves insane trying to make sense of all the polls coming out. We're at the point where unless you are working ON a campaign, the only poll that "matters" is the one on election day. But every so often a number jumps out, like the massive swing of independent women voters to the GOP.

title: Debunking John Oliver's 'Trans Rights' Video Point by Point (Show Notes)
description: John Oliver said an alarming number of wrong things about transgender "rights." This is our largest debunking of one of the British "comedian's" videos yet! Also Kanye West is buying Parler. And who is the Stockton killer?

title: Poor woman gets wedged between two fat people on a plane and the airline shames HER for it
description: The unwritten rule of air travel is that the person who is in the center seat gets both armrests. That's difficult to do when to the left and to the right, both armrests are covered in rolls on rolls on rolls of body fat. That's what journalist Sydney Watson found herself having to deal with. title: 'F*** your horse': Watch as a brawl outside of a gay bar turns into chaos in yet another crime-ridden progressive city
description:
In the olden days, the word "gay" meant "happy." No one seemed happy as chaos unfolded outside of Minneapolis gay bar The Gay 90s. Except for the girls twerking on cars. They looked like they were having fun.

title: Watch: Kari Lake shuts down CNN and the entire Democratic Party in only two minutes
description: Prior to November 3rd, 2020, no one in the history of the republic had EVER questioned the results of an election. That is the narrative the media is running with.
